content.title: Two government hospitals, three others seek to strike out negligence suit over botched circumcision - Nation - The Star Online
content.desc: KUALA LUMPUR: Two government hospitals and three others are seeking to strike out a negligence suit filed by a teenager, who suffered permanent disability ...

content.title: Botched circumcision: Five defendants apply to strike out suit - Malaysiakini
content.desc: Malaysiakini The government and four others, who were named defendants in a negligence suit filed by a man over a circumcision that went awry when he was 10 years old, have applied to strike out the suit. Besides the government, the other defendants are Kuala Lipis Hospital medical officer and its director, as well as a specialist doctor and director of Selayang Hospital. They were named the second to sixth defendants in the suit. A medical assistant at Kuala Lipis Hospital, who was named the first defendant, had filed an application to strike out the suit, but later withdrew the application. Lawyer Moh...
